title: Admin UI - Allow creating new Files
description: After we got the Possibility to modify files from SOLR-5446, we could allow to create new files from the same interface

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content:
Ready to go, will commit tomorrow after another round of testing.

Includes a small form (below the tree) which accepts a filename, changing onto "the next page" displays a empty form w/ a small note on top, that the file actually does (not yet) exist.

Saving a non-existing file will refresh the tree, so the newly created file should be visible right away.
